Package cufy.concurrent

When it comes to concurrent actions.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    For<I>
    A Loop version of the typical 'for' statement.
    Foreach<I>
    Loop for each item of a list.
    Forever
    Looping until get broken manually.
    Instructor
    Used to be the communication method between 2 (or more) threads (loops).
    Lock<T>
    A java lock locker thread.
    Loop<I,P>
    Controllable loop.
    Once
    A loop to do code just one time.
    While
    A Loop version of the typical 'while' statement.

Package cufy.concurrent Description

When it comes to concurrent actions. Complexity is all over the place. Using instances that manages those concurrent actions is the solution. Those utils helps to deal with concurrent actions and infinite loops. And many other concurrent actions. And what makes it special that it depends on the logic rather than the timing.
Since:
18-May-2019
Version:
0.1.3
Author:
lsafer
See Also:
framework.cufy.org/site/concurrent
